name: Revilock
senses: blindsight 30 ft., or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14

actions.name: Spiked Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Throttle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 12) and can't breathe. Until this grapple ends  the grimlock can't use any attack other than throttle and only against the grappled target  and it makes this attack with advantage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The grimlock has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The grimlock has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Psionic Spellcasting
